snippet.textDisplay: This game and Marvel vs Capcom are easily the fighting games I played the most during that console generation. It's only later that I learned the Playstation port of this game was lackluster compared to the Saturn version, mainly the absence of tag team combat and missing frames. Still, I had tons of fun with it and I'd always use either Ken, Wolverine of Sabretooth. Good times.
snippet.textOriginal: This game and Marvel vs Capcom are easily the fighting games I played the most during that console generation. It's only later that I learned the Playstation port of this game was lackluster compared to the Saturn version, mainly the absence of tag team combat and missing frames. Still, I had tons of fun with it and I'd always use either Ken, Wolverine of Sabretooth. Good times.

snippet.textDisplay: this is the game that started it all..Qsounds really shined on this one....between this and street fighter alpha 2 it was soo many classic melodic gems. i will forever love the way this game came and changed the whole fukking game....will we ever get a solid depiction of Gambit like this ever again??? game, movie...please somebody help

snippet.textDisplay:
So...Cammy is roofied, 
Rogue just caught Gambit in bed with Colossus and she doesn't know whether to be angry or confused, 
Wolverine is pissed yet drunk and needs to sneeze REAL bad, 
Ryu is chucking Hadokens since that's what he does...every round...the entire round..., 
Cyclops is severely constipated and is trying to drop diamonds, 
Zangief wants to make out with the Juggernaut bitch, 
Chun-Li thinks she's a forum moderator and is demanding to know what's going on in this thread, 
Magneto is powering-up his hand so he can trim his eyebrows.
That about cover it?
snippet.textOriginal:
So...Cammy is roofied, 
Rogue just caught Gambit in bed with Colossus and she doesn't know whether to be angry or confused, 
Wolverine is pissed yet drunk and needs to sneeze REAL bad, 
Ryu is chucking Hadokens since that's what he does...every round...the entire round..., 
Cyclops is severely constipated and is trying to drop diamonds, 
Zangief wants to make out with the Juggernaut bitch, 
Chun-Li thinks she's a forum moderator and is demanding to know what's going on in this thread, 
Magneto is powering-up his hand so he can trim his eyebrows.
That about cover it?
